website_summaries.verdict: The classic design, in lots of colors and patterns.
pros: Gold logo on the front makes it stand out from the crowd

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these flip flops millions of times and they’ve lasted forever, after the second time wearing the bottom film has began to peel off and break away
customer_reviews.author: candice

customer_reviews.title: Costly to return
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, if you don’t like them and want to return you must pay $24 to ship to Canada plus a 20% restocking fee... so not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: My friend loves them.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a friend who wanted them. She loves them so much! She said they fit perfect and were really comfortable. To me they seemed like a pretty basic flip flop, but the little medallion (Tory Burch logo) was a nice accent. I'm not sure I would have paid this much for a basic black flip flop, but that's me. She liked them so much, she bought a pair for her niece too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I read from another review that you need to get a 1/2 size larger. I take size 8 1/2 and I'm glad I bought s size 9. Love these shoes. Can't wait to wear them when the heat wave comes to Toronto.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These flip-flops are perfect to just slip on when going to the store
customer_reviews.text: These flip-flops are perfect to just slip on when going to the store!! They're very comfortable and don't rub at all!! They are not a beach or pool kind of flip flop for when they get wet your feet slide.
customer_reviews.author: D-Michelle

customer_reviews.title: not sure if authentic....
customer_reviews.text: these ran 1/4" smaller than the same ones I got at TB. Not sure they're authentic or not, but arrived in nice box and fine for black rubber flip-flops
customer_reviews.author: Jcolecav

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then normal?
customer_reviews.text: I feel like these were at least a whole size smaller then all of the other same size shoes that I already have. I ended up keeping and gave to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: M. Levy

customer_reviews.title: for good company  Turn back company
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter have size 6 they are too small .I am Trying to return and they charge me for shipping almost 50$. SO know I have to keep them .
customer_reviews.author: Amkaterinaazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful...
customer_reviews.text: Just got these in the mail yesterday. The sole is very slippery , especially in the heel area. My foot slips off of them & I feel like I will fall. :-/ I expected better quality from Tory Burch brand.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thin flip flops, it is my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely flip-flops
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Very happy withe the seller & the flip-flops. Super cute purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable slide or flips flop !
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable , good prices for good brand , perfect for this weather (Summer ) to go to the supermarket , nail salon etc . Recomend
customer_reviews.author: Astric Lemus-Galvez

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing and fashionable flip flops.
customer_reviews.text: Support cannot be expected in these flip flops so I don’t know why it’s even asked. I LOVE Tory Burch!!!! Even have an over abundance of her shoes and flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect flip flop
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about them! The gold and black token on the top just makes them perfect. The strap is smooth so even brand new doesn’t rub.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty flip flops
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color and comfortable flip flop, but not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn C. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Great Flip Flop!
customer_reviews.text: Love these easy slip on Flip Flops! Comfortable and not too tight anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Lcrooks

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have had many pairs of these flip flops before, but this is the first time I have ordered them from amazon and they did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the brand and good fit
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the brand and good fit. But took more than month to deliver the product.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful flip flops, only make sure to get an extra number, they come shorter than regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Elena Garcia Lizardi

customer_reviews.title: New sandals
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I needed. It came in a very nice package and was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Flips flops make noise I know but these are squeaky disappointed for the price I pd
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Raby

customer_reviews.title: Love these ff
customer_reviews.text: Love these ff. They are simple. I'm a 6.5 so I ordered the 7 fits like a glove. Not too big not too small.
customer_reviews.author: DG luv 2 shop

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it. Super cute and go with everything.
customer_reviews.author: JenMO

customer_reviews.title: Just as anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality leather and nice details ! Very well made
customer_reviews.author: Barbara N Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Great Flippers!
customer_reviews.text: Love these flip flops! I had them in black and wanted a neutral color. Love the way they look and feel!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Gray

customer_reviews.title: Love them and the price is great for Tory
customer_reviews.text: Classy flops! Love them and the price is great for Tory Burch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! Usually wear a 7 1/2 but ordered an 8 and they are perfecto.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great flip flops!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Very comfortable! And absolutely love the Tory Burch logo on the front. I want these in all colors.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The flip flops are so cute! I wear them with everything! And they got delivered so quick.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Shapiro

product_meta.title: Tory Burch Women's Thin Flip Flops
product_meta.description: No-fuss Tory Burch flip flops, ideal for pool parties, beach getaways, or sunny Saturdays in the park. Gold-tone logo emblems add a distinct finish to this pair.
